snippet: The presidents of Metro-North and the L.I.R.R. urge extension of the deadline for a new safety system.
abstract: Letter from Howard Permut, president of Metro-North Railroad, and Helena Williams, president of Long Island Rail Road, responds to April 30 editorial about extending Congress's deadline to implement a new national safety systems for railroads. (M)s
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Don't Bargain With Rail Safety'' (editorial, April 30):

headline.main: Attention, Riders: A Word From Two Rail Chiefs
